line: Section 1 - Personal Injury Insurance
label: heading

line: If during a Period of Insurance an Accident occurs during
label: paragraph

line: the Effective Time and causes Bodily Injury to an Insured
label: paragraph

line: Person ACE will pay
label: paragraph

line: Schedule of Benefits.
label: paragraph

line: up to the amounts shown in the
label: paragraph

line: Disappearance - If an Insured Person disappears and after
label: paragraph

line: a suitable period of time it is reasonable for the Police or
label: paragraph

line: registration authorities to believe that such Insured Person
label: paragraph

line: has died as a result of Bodily Injury, the death Benefit shall
label: paragraph

line: become payable subject to a signed undertaking given by
label: paragraph

line: the Insured Person’s personal representatives that if the
label: paragraph

line: belief is subsequently found to be wrong such death Benefit
label: paragraph

line: shall be refunded to ACE.
label: paragraph

line: Extensions of Cover to Section 1
label: heading

line: Accident Medical Expenses
label: heading

line: ACE will pay the Insured for Accident Medical Expenses
label: paragraph

line: incurred in the Insured’s country of residence up to a
label: paragraph

line: maximum of 25% of any amount paid by ACE under Benefit
label: paragraph

line: 1 to 4 as set out in the Schedule subject to a maximum total
label: paragraph

line: amount of £20,000.
label: paragraph

line: H ospital Confinement Benefit
label: paragraph

line: If during the Period of Insurance, an Accident occurs during
label: paragraph

line: the Effective Time shown in the Schedule and the Insured
label: paragraph

line: sustains Bodily Injury which, independently of Illness or any
label: paragraph

line: other cause, results in their Hospital Confinement within
label: paragraph

line: twelve calendar months from the date of the Accident, ACE
label: paragraph

line: will pay the Insured £50 for each complete twenty-four hour
label: paragraph

line: period of such Hospital
label: paragraph

line: benefit of £2,000.
label: paragraph

line: Confinement up to a maximum
label: paragraph

line: H ome Confinement Benefit
label: paragraph

line: ACE will pay £40 for each complete day of Home
label: paragraph

line: Confinement immediately following discharge from hospital,
label: paragraph

line: provided hospitalisation lasted for a minimum of 72
label: paragraph

line: consecutive hours and was the direct result of Bodily Injury.
label: paragraph

line: Payment will be made up to a maximum of 90 days for any
label: paragraph

line: one accident.
label: paragraph

line: D efinition applicable to Home Confinement
label: paragraph

line: Benefit
label: heading

line: Home Confinement shall mean confinement to the normal
label: paragraph

line: place of residence on the advice of, and whilst remaining in
label: paragraph

line: the care and attendance of, a General Practitioner. Home
label: paragraph

line: Confinement is deemed to be over when the Insured Person
label: paragraph

line: is fit to leave the normal place of residence as judged by the
label: paragraph

line: attending Qualified Medical Practitioner.
label: paragraph

line: Where Bodily Injury results in Quadriplegia or Paraplegia,

line: and the benefit for Permanent Total Disablement becomes

line: payable, ACE will also indemnify the Insured Person for
label: paragraph

line: expenses necessarily incurred to modify their Home

line: (limited to the modification for external or Internal wheel
label: paragraph

line: chair access, internal guide rails, emergency alert systems),
label: paragraph

line: necessary for the Insured Person to perform their daily
label: paragraph

line: activities of washing, cooking, bathing, and dressing and to
label: paragraph

line: remain in and move around their
label: paragraph

line: of GBP5,000.
label: paragraph

line: Home up to a maximum
label: paragraph

line: Conditions applicable to Home Modification

line: This benefit is only payable where such renovations are

line: undertaken with the prior written agreement of ACE and the

line: agreement of the Insured Person attending Qualified

line: Loss of Enjoyment of Life Benefit
label: heading

line: ACE will pay an additional 5% of the Permanent Total
label: paragraph

line: disablement sum insured as stated in the schedule , or
label: paragraph

line: GBP5,000, whichever is the lesser to compensate the
label: paragraph

line: Insured Person for Loss of Enjoyment of Life following a
label: paragraph

line: claim which is payable under section 1
label: paragraph

line: Definitions Applicable Loss of Enjoyment of Life
label: heading

line: Loss of Enjoyment of Life shall mean an injury to an Insured
label: paragraph

line: Person which in the opinion of the Insured Person's
label: paragraph

line: Qualified Medical Practitioner necessitates the assistance of
label: paragraph

line: another person or a mechanical device to undertake two or
label: paragraph

line: more of the following activities for the remainder of the
label: paragraph

line: Insured Persons life:
label: paragraph

line: i) dressing and undressing; or
label: paragraph

line: ii) washing, bathing and toileting; or
label: paragraph

line: iii) eating and drinking; or
label: paragraph

line: iv) general household duties, shopping and driving
label: paragraph

line: S ection 2 – Coma
label: paragraph

line: If during a Period of Insurance an Accident occurs during
label: paragraph

line: the Effective Time and causes Bodily Injury to an Insured
label: paragraph

line: Person resulting in the Insured Person falling into a Coma
label: paragraph

line: lasting the length of the Deferment Period ACE will pay the
label: paragraph

line: Benefit Amount specified in the Schedule of Benefits to the
label: paragraph

line: Policyholder/Partner or, if there is no Partner, to the Insured
label: paragraph

line: Person’s adult next of kin - on behalf of the Insured Person
label: paragraph

line: for each full week during which the Insured Person remains
label: paragraph

line: in a Coma up to the maximum Benefit Period.
label: paragraph

line: Specific Conditions, Specific Exclusions and
label: heading

line: Specific Definitions applicable to the Coma
label: heading

line: Section
label: heading

line: Benefit Period shall mean the maximum consecutive
label: paragraph

line: period for which the Coma benefit is payable in respect
label: paragraph

line: of any Insured Person. The Benefit Period commences
label: paragraph

line: at the end of the Deferment Period.
label: paragraph

line: Deferment Period shall mean a period at the beginning
label: paragraph

line: of a period of a Coma during which benefits are not
label: paragraph

line: payable.
label: paragraph

line: Section 3 - Broken Bones
label: heading

line: If during a Period of Insurance an Accident occurs during
label: paragraph

line: the Effective Time and causes Bodily Injury to an Insured
label: paragraph

line: Person resulting in Broken Bones ACE will pay the Benefit
label: paragraph

line: Amount specified in the Schedule of Benefits Due To one
label: paragraph

line: Accident. In the event of multiple Fractures to a bone as a
label: paragraph

line: result of one Accident the Benefit Amount will apply only
label: paragraph

line: once to each bone Fractured. ACE will consider a Colles’
label: paragraph

line: Fracture or a Pott’s Fracture to be a single Fracture of a
label: paragraph

line: bone.
label: paragraph

line: Specific Definitions applicable to the Broken
label: heading

line: Bones Section
label: heading

line: Broken Bones shall mean the Fracture of one or more of the
label: paragraph

line: bones listed below:
label: paragraph

line: a) Grade I:
label: paragraph

line: Code: Endsleigh Sports Association Template
label: paragraph

line: lower leg (fibula);
label: paragraph

line: hand (metacarpals);
label: paragraph

line: foot (metatarsals);
label: paragraph

line: Coccyx;
label: paragraph

line: single rib; and
label: paragraph

line: nose.
label: paragraph

line: b) Grade II:
label: paragraph

line: vertebra other than vertebral body;
label: paragraph

line: lower leg (tibia);
label: paragraph

line: lower jaw;
label: paragraph

line: breastbone (sternum);
label: paragraph

line: two or more ribs;
label: paragraph

line: clavicle (collar bone);
label: paragraph

line: shoulder blade (scapula);
label: paragraph

line: kneecap (patella);
label: paragraph

line: ankle (tarsals);
label: paragraph

line: upper arm (humerus);
label: paragraph

line: lower arm (radius and ulna); and
label: paragraph

line: wrist (carpals).
label: paragraph

line: c) Grade III:
label: paragraph

line: upper leg (femur);
label: paragraph

line: vertebral body (not Coccyx);
label: paragraph

line: Pelvis; and
label: paragraph

line: Skull (including facial bones).
label: paragraph

line: Coccyx shall mean four fused vertebrae at the bottom of
label: paragraph

line: the spine.
label: paragraph

line: Colles’ Fracture shall mean a Fracture of the wrist
label: paragraph

line: involving a break of the distal end of both radius and ulna.
label: paragraph

line: Fracture/Fractured shall mean a break in the continuity of
label: paragraph

line: the bone.
label: paragraph

line: Osteoporosis shall mean the thinning of the bone out of
label: paragraph

line: proportion to age.
label: paragraph

line: Pathological Fracture shall mean any Fracture in an area
label: paragraph

line: where pre-existing disease has caused weakening of the
label: paragraph

line: bone.
label: paragraph

line: Pelvis shall mean all pelvic bones excluding the Sacrum.
label: paragraph

line: Pott’s Fracture shall mean a Fracture of the ankle (talo-
label: paragraph

line: tibial joint) involving both a Fracture of the lower end of the
label: paragraph

line: fibula and a Fracture of the lower end of the tibia.
label: paragraph

line: Sacrum shall mean the five fused bones at the base of the
label: paragraph

line: vertebral body.
label: paragraph

line: Skull shall mean all skull and facial bones excluding nasal
label: paragraph

line: bones or teeth.
label: paragraph

line: Specific Exclusions applicable to the Broken
label: heading

line: Bones Section
label: heading

line: ACE shall not be liable for payment of any benefit for Bodily
label: paragraph

line: Injury, loss or expense for Broken Bones Due To:
label: paragraph

line: Fractures to bones of the fingers or toes;
label: paragraph

line: Pathological Fractures; or
label: paragraph

line: Osteoporosis or bone disease which was diagnosed
label: paragraph

line: prior to the Commencement Date.
label: paragraph

line: Section 4 - Primary Dislocation
label: heading

line: If during a Period of Insurance an Accident occurs during
label: paragraph

line: the Effective Time and causes Bodily Injury to an Insured
label: paragraph

line: Person resulting in a Primary Dislocation ACE will pay the
label: paragraph

line: Benefit Amount specified in the Schedule of Benefits. The
label: paragraph

line: Benefit Amount is the maximum ACE will pay for all Primary
label: paragraph

line: Dislocations Due To one Accident.
label: paragraph

line: Specific Definition applicable to the Primary
label: heading

line: Dislocation Section
label: heading

line: Primary Dislocation shall mean the dislocation for the first
label: paragraph

line: time of a body part listed below requiring surgery under
label: paragraph

line: anaesthesia:
label: paragraph

line: a) hip;
label: paragraph

line: b) shoulder;
label: paragraph

line: a) kneecap.
label: paragraph

line: S pecific Exclusions applicable to the Primary
label: paragraph

line: Dislocation Section
label: heading

line: ACE shall not be liable for payment of any benefit for Bodily
label: paragraph

line: Injury, loss or expense for Primary Dislocation Due To:
label: paragraph

line: 1 . Osteoporosis or bone disease which was diagnosed
label: paragraph

line: prior to the Commencement Date; or
label: paragraph

line: 2 . secondary or subsequent dislocations of the hip,
label: paragraph

line: shoulder or kneecap.
label: paragraph

line: S ection 5 - Physiotherapy following
label: paragraph

line: Broken Bones or Primary Dislocation
label: heading

line: I f during a Period of Insurance an Accident occurs during
label: paragraph

line: the Effective Time and causes Bodily Injury to an Insured
label: paragraph

line: Person resulting in a valid claim being paid under this Policy
label: paragraph

line: for Section 5. Broken Bones or Section 6. Primary
label: paragraph

line: Dislocation ACE will pay up to the Benefit Amount
label: paragraph

line: specified in the Schedule of Benefits to reimburse the
label: paragraph

line: treatment costs incurred for Physiotherapy. The treatment
label: paragraph

line: must be received within 12 months of the Accident.
label: paragraph

line: S pecific Definition applicable to the
label: paragraph

line: Physiotherapy Section
label: heading

line: Physiotherapy shall mean out patient treatment received on
label: paragraph

line: the advice of a Qualified Medical Practitioner and given by a
label: paragraph

line: physiotherapist who is state registered (SRP) and a
label: paragraph

line: Member of the Chartered Society of Physiotherapy (MCSP).
label: paragraph

line: Specific Exclusions applicable to the
label: heading

line: Physiotherapy Section
label: heading

line: ACE will not pay for Physiotherapy treatment:
label: paragraph

line: a) not claimed for within 365 days of the incident
label: paragraph

line: which caused the injury.
label: paragraph

line: Code: Endsleigh Sports Association Template
label: paragraph

line: b) unless the Insured Person has paid for the first 2
label: paragraph

line: Physiotherapy Treatments following a valid claim
label: paragraph

line: under Section 5. Broken Bones or Section 6.
label: paragraph

line: Primary Dislocation
label: heading

line: ACE shall not be liable for:
label: paragraph

line: a) Any additional costs incurred as a result of further
label: paragraph

line: treatment being required after 10 sessions
label: paragraph

label: paragraph

line: Accommodation Expenses in the United
label: heading

line: Kingdom

label: paragraph

line: ill or sustains injury during a Journey within the United

line: Kingdom and requires Hospital treatment ACE will
label: paragraph

line: indemnify the Policyholder up to the Benefit Amount shown

line: in Schedule of Benefits A in respect of Supplementary
label: paragraph

line: Travel and Accommodation Expenses.
label: paragraph

label: paragraph

label: heading

line: all reasonable transportation costs by private
label: paragraph

line: ambulance or air ambulance to a Hospital local to the

line: Insured Person’s home address, subject to the

line: agreement of a Qualified Medical Practitioner.
label: paragraph

line: all reasonable costs incurred in providing qualified
label: paragraph

line: medical staff to accompany the Insured Person to a

line: Hospital local to their home address, subject to the

line: agreement of a Qualified Medical Practitioner.
label: paragraph

line: up to a maximum of £50 in transporting the Insured
label: paragraph

line: Person to their home address following discharge from

label: paragraph

line: provided that all transportation and the provision of

line: qualified medical staff is:

line: a) medically necessary; and

label: paragraph
